author: MiniWarGaming
description:
Matthew talks about why Mordheim is still loved by so many, despite (or maybe because of) the fact that Games Workshop hasn't updated it in over a decade.

#mordheim 

Watch our Mordheim narrative campaign:  https://www.miniwargaming.com/mordheim

title: Why Mordheim Is Still One of the Best Games Ever Made
